actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 439.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Kate Lee; Paula Ray; James Owens; Nayomie Flood; Janice Sullivan; Dorothy White; Charles Sullivan; Bobby Sullivan; Andre Sullivan; Johnny Sullivan; Billy Sullivan; Patricia Crawley.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay a gratuity to the children of a deceased employee of the Architect of the Capitol who was assigned to duty on the Senate side at the time of her death.

titles.title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Kate Lee; Paula Ray; James Owens; Nayomie Flood; Janice Sullivan; Dorothy White; Charles Sullivan; Bobby Sullivan; Andre Sullivan; Johnny Sullivan; Billy Sullivan; Patricia Crawley.
